scripts.dev:wasm: PATH=$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH && cd rust-wasm && cargo watch -i pkg -s 'wasm-pack build --target web --dev' && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:web
scripts.postbuild:wasm: echo 'âœ… WASM built. Verifying TypeScript types...' && (cd web && npm run type-check)
scripts.test: npm run test:rust && npm run test:web
scripts.clean: rm -rf rust-wasm/target rust-wasm/pkg web/dist web/node_modules node_modules
